gadget.name: diplomacydialog-LockTeams
gadget.tooltiptext: $$STR_EDT_LOCK_TEAMS_L$$Prevents diplomatic stances from being changed. Overridden by match settings

gadget.name: CombatCommands-AggressiveBtn
gadget.tooltiptext: $$STR_EDT_STANC_SET_AGR$$Click to set all selected units to Agressive stance.

gadget.name: CombatCommands-DefensiveBtn
gadget.tooltiptext: $$STR_EDT_STANC_SET_DEF$$Click to set all selected units to Defensive stance.

gadget.name: CombatCommands-StandGroundBtn
gadget.tooltiptext: $$STR_EDT_STANC_SET_STG$$Click to set all selected units to Stand Ground stance.

gadget.name: CombatCommands-NoAttackBtn
gadget.tooltiptext: $$STR_EDT_STANC_SET_NOA$$Click to set all selected units to No Attack stance.
